name: my-electron-react-app
description: A basic Electron app with React

scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others "npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --config webpack/main.webpack.config.js --watch" "npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webpack serve --config webpack/renderer.webpack.config.js" "npx wait-on http://localhost:4000 && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --config webpack/main.webpack.config.js && npx webpack --config webpack/renderer.webpack.config.js

author: t-i
